ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the Faculty of Biotechnology and Biomolecular Sciences, Universiti Putra Malaysia (UPM), for providing the lab facilities for the study. This project was supported by the Ministry of Higher Education (MOHE), Malaysia, under Fundamental Research Grant Scheme (FRGS-trans) (ref. TD-FRGS/2/2013/UPM/02/1/2). The authors wish to acknowledge the efforts of Dr. Yusuf Yakubu of the Department of Veterinary Public Health and Preventive Medicine, Usmanu Danfodiyo University Sokoto, for the statistical analysis and proofreading.
